print integer.body:
move		\$a0, ${1:\$t0}			# \$a0 = $1
li			\$v0, 1				# syscall print int
syscall							# execute

print string 1.body:
move		\$a0, ${1:\$t0}			# \$a0 = $1
li			\$v0, 4				# syscall print str
syscall							# execute

print string 2.body:
la			\$a0, ${1:str}			# \$a0 = $1
li			\$v0, 4				# syscall print str
syscall							# execute

read integer.body:
li			\$v0, 5				# syscall read int
syscall							# execute
move		${1:\$t0}, \$v0			# $1 = \$v0

allocate memory.body:
li			\$a0, ${1:4}				# allocate $1 bytes
li			\$v0, 9				# syscall allocate memory
syscall							# execute

open file.body:
la			\$a0, ${1:str}			# \$a0 = $1
li			\$a1, ${2|0,1|}				# flag $2
li			\$a2, ${3:0}				# mode $3
li			\$v0, 13				# syscall open file
syscall							# execute
move		${4:\$t0}, \$v0			# copy file descriptor

open file to read.body:
la			\$a0, ${1:str}			# \$a0 = $1
li			\$a1, ${2:0}				# flag $2
li			\$a2, ${3:0}				# mode $3
li			\$v0, 13				# syscall open file
syscall							# execute
move		${4:\$t0}, \$v0			# copy file descriptor

open file to write.body:
la			\$a0, ${1:str}			# \$a0 = $1
li			\$a1, ${2:1}				# flag $2
li			\$a2, ${3:0}				# mode $3
li			\$v0, 13				# syscall open file
syscall							# execute
move		${4:\$t0}, \$v0			# copy file descriptor

read file.body:
move		\$a0, ${1:\$t0}			# \$a0 = $1 read $1
la			\$a1, ${2:buffer}			# \$a1 = $2
li			\$a2, ${3:4}				# $3 bytes to read
li			\$v0, 14				# syscall read file
syscall							# execute
move		${4:\$t0}, \$v0			# copy number of bytes read

write file.body:
move		\$a0, ${1:\$t0}			# \$a0 = $1 write $1
la			\$a1, ${2:buffer}			# \$a1 = $2
li			\$a2, ${3:4}				# $3 bytes to write
li			\$v0, 15				# syscall write file
syscall							# execute
move		${4:\$t0}, \$v0			# copy number of bytes write

close file.body:
move		\$a0, ${1:\$t0}			# \$a0 = $1 close $1
li			\$v0, 16				# syscall close file
syscall							# execute
